channel.title: anki on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in anki on Barefoot Rob

item.title: been studying world geography
item.description: 12:28 Saturday 18 July 2015 JST I now know where Burundi and Rwanda are, as well as Gambia, Senegal, Mazambique, Macedonia, Ivory Coast, Georgia, Croatia, Luxembourg, San Marino, Somalia, Eritrea, Swaziland, Algeria, Niger, Nigeria, ummm others I can’t recall names offhand.
